name: Upflow
headline: Modern cash collection for B2B businesses.
description:
Upflow is building high-quality software to help mid-market B2B companies improve their cash collection and grow profitably.

B2B payment remains super painful for both suppliers and customers in 2023. Through a one-click integration with major financial software (Netsuite, Sage Intacct, Quickbooks) it provides finance and business teams with:
1. A better understanding of their cash collection performance through powerful analytics
2. An intuitive platform for all teams (finance, sales, success) to collaborate around cash collection, turning archaic spreadsheet processes into systematic, personalized cash collection processes.
3. A platform to bring modern payment methods to customers and recreate a consumer-like checkout experience with one click payment. 

Overall, Upflow drastically improve cash collection rates and turn revenues into cash in the bank faster, simpler.

The best B2B tech companies, such as Front, Lattice, ProductBoard, rely on Upflow to manage their cash collection. If you're a CFO, Controller, or Finance Ops, check out our free Discover product to run an audit of your cash collection in 5 min: https://insights.upflow.io/en/discover-upflow

## How Upflow works 
Click below to discover some of our features. Experience the technology you need to turn your revenue into cash, and build better customer relationships in the process.
Gain valuable insightsProcess your collectionHelp your customers pay you
![](https://upflow.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F130573%2F2400x1480%2F0dd33c0519%2Fgreen.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://upflow.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F130573%2F2400x1480%2Ffe02c48f3d%2Fblue.png&w=3840&q=75)

## Understand your cash flow
Measure and analyze your cash flow and make informed business decisions.
  * Live dashboards
  * Financial forecasting
  * Days sales outstanding


Access real-time AR insights
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272676%27%20height=%272168%27/%3e)![Understand your cashflow with Accounts Receivable Software](https://upflow.io/en/)
## Achieve cash collection excellence
Streamline your collection processes to instantly reduce your DSO and improve your CEI.
  * Unlock cash in your receivables
  * Send automated personalised payment reminders
  * Collaborate with the right stakeholders to get paid on time


Improve your cash performance
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272608%27%20height=%272620%27/%3e)![Systematic and personalized collection with Understand your cashflow with Accounts Receivable Software](https://upflow.io/en/)
## Offer modern payments
Help your customers pay you. Provide a seamless self-service payment experience and get paid on time.
  * Diversify your payment methods
  * Automatic cash application
  * Autopay for instant payment on invoice due date


Offer more payment methods 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272708%27%20height=%272284%27/%3e)![Streamline Payments with A/R Software](https://upflow.io/en/)
## Finance Teams, get ahead of the curve. 
Spreadsheets are a thing of the past. Turn your revenue into cash today and continue growing your business. 
Request a demo
## Connect your tools. All of them.
Upflow seamlessly integrates with the way you work today. Keep your existing invoicing and accounting tools and leverage the power of Upflow within a few minutes.
[Discover our API](https://upflow.io/en/<https:/upflow.docs.apiary.io/#reference>)

Sneh Dadlani, Controller @ Front

## How Upflow works 
Click below to discover some of our features. Experience the technology you need to turn your revenue into cash, and build better customer relationships in the process.
Gain valuable insightsProcess your collectionHelp your customers pay you
![](https://upflow.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F130573%2F2400x1480%2F0dd33c0519%2Fgreen.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://upflow.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F130573%2F2400x1480%2Ffe02c48f3d%2Fblue.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://upflow.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa.storyblok.com%2Ff%2F130573%2F2400x1480%2F73f68f90c5%2Forange.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Understand your cash flow
Measure and analyze your cash flow and make informed business decisions.
  * Live dashboards
  * Financial forecasting
  * Days sales outstanding


Access real-time AR insights
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272676%27%20height=%272168%27/%3e)![Understand your cashflow with Accounts Receivable Software⟨28⟩]
## Achieve cash collection excellence
Streamline your collection processes to instantly reduce your DSO and improve your CEI.
  * Unlock cash in your receivables
  * Send automated personalised payment reminders
  * Collaborate with the right stakeholders to get paid on time


Improve your cash performance
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272608%27%20height=%272620%27/%3e)![Systematic and personalized collection with Understand your cashflow with Accounts Receivable Software⟨28⟩]
## Offer modern payments
Help your customers pay you. Provide a seamless self-service payment experience and get paid on time.
  * Diversify your payment methods
  * Automatic cash application
  * Autopay for instant payment on invoice due date


Offer more payment methods 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272708%27%20height=%272284%27/%3e)![Streamline Payments with A/R Software⟨28⟩]
## Finance Teams, get ahead of the curve. 
Spreadsheets are a thing of the past. Turn your revenue into cash today and continue growing your business. 
Request a demo
## Connect your tools. All of them.
Upflow seamlessly integrates with the way you work today. Keep your existing invoicing and accounting tools and leverage the power of Upflow within a few minutes.
Discover our API⟨18⟩

Sneh Dadlani, Controller @ Front

generated_description:
**Upflow: Revolutionizing B2B Cash Collection**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch, Upflow is on a mission to transform the often painful cash collection processes for mid-market B2B companies. Based in New York and staffed by a dedicated team of 70, Upflow simplifies and modernizes invoicing through innovative software integration.

**Why the Need?**  
In 2023, B2B payment processes are notoriously cumbersome for both suppliers and customers. Upflow addresses this with a straightforward, one-click integration with major financial software solutions like Netsuite, Sage Intacct, and Quickbooks. Here's what it brings to the table:

1. **Insightful Analytics**: Users gain a clearer picture of their cash collection performance, allowing them to make data-driven decisions.
2. **Collaboration Tools**: The platform turns outdated spreadsheet workflows into a collaborative hub where finance, sales, and customer success teams work together seamlessly.
3. **Modern Payment Solutions**: It offers a consumer-like checkout experience with easy one-click payments, increasing the likelihood of timely collections.

**Impact**  
The Upflow platform significantly enhances cash collection rates, transforming revenues into cash faster and more effortlessly. Notably, industry leaders like Front, Lattice, and ProductBoard trust Upflow to manage their cash collection.

**What's New?**  
Upflow is evolving into a comprehensive Financial Relationship Management (FRM) solution, moving beyond mere cash collection. This expansion aims to further strengthen customer relationships while optimizing financial operations. 

**For Financial Leaders**  
If you're a CFO, Controller, or in Finance Operations, you can explore Upflow's offerings through its free **Discover** product, which lets you audit your cash collection in just five minutes. Don't let outdated processes hold your business back—visit [Upflow's website](https://upflow.io/en/) for more information, or check out their Discover tool directly [here](https://insights.upflow.io/en/discover-upflow).

In essence, Upflow is all about faster payments and stronger financial relationships. Whether you're looking to streamline operations or enhance customer engagement, Upflow's the partner you need.
